trend.description: Trend of the state of the faction.

name.description: Name of the faction of the system.

state.description: State of the faction of the system.

allegiance.description: Allegiance of the faction of the system.

government.description: Government type of the faction of the system.

activeStates.description: Currently active states for this faction.

Timestamps.description: Update timestamps for individual attributes, mapping attribute to last updated timestamp.

name.description: Name of the belt or ring.

type.description: Type of the ring or belt.

mass.description: Mass of the belt or ring, measured in Megatonnes.

innerRadius.description: Inner radius of the belt or ring, measured in Kilometres.

outerRadius.description: Outer radius of the belt or ring, measured in Kilometres.

id64.description: ID64 of the belt or ring, a 64 bit unsigned integer.

signals.description: The signals that can be found within the belt or ring.

updateTime.description: The timestamp that the signals were last updated, in UTC.

BodyTerraformingState.description: Planets only.  Terraforming state of the planet.

enum: Green Gas Giant with Ammonia Life

id64.description: The ID64 of the body, a 64 bit unsigned integer.

bodyId.description: The numeric ID of the body within the system, a 64 bit unsigned integer.

orbitalPeriod.description: The orbital period of the body, measured in days.

semiMajorAxis.description: The semi major axis of the body, measured in Kilometers.

orbitalEccentricity.description: The orbital eccentricity of the body.

orbitalInclination.description: The orbital inclinction of the body, measured in degrees.

argOfPeriapsis.description: The argument of periapsis the body, measured in degrees.

meanAnomaly.description: The mean of anomaly the body, measured in degrees.

ascendingNode.description: The ascending node of the body, measured in degrees.

timestamps.description: Timestamps of the last update of some of the fields within the body.

stations.description: Stations which are located on the body, planet based stations.

updateTime.description: Timestamp of the last update of the body, in UTC.

distanceToArrival.description: Distance to the system arrival point of the body, measured in Kilometres.

mainStar.description: Stars only.  Whether this is the main star of the system or not.

age.description: Stars only.  The age of the star, measured in solar years.

spectralClass.description: Stars only.  Spectral class of the star.

luminosity.description: Stars only.  Luminosity of the star.

absoluteMagnitude.description: Stars only.  Absolute magnitude of the star.

solarMasses.description: Stars only. Mass of the star, as a ratio of the mass of Sol.

solarRadius.description: Stars only. Radius of the star, as a ratio of the radius of Sol.

surfaceTemperature.description: Surface temperature of the body, measured in Kelvin.

rotationalPeriod.description: Rotational period of the body, measured in Days.

rotationalPeriodTidallyLocked.description: Whether the rotational period of the body is locked to the tides.

axialTilt.description: Axial tilt of the body, measured in radians.

parents.description: Parents of the body, mapping each parent body type to it's ID within the system.

isLandable.description: Planets only.  Whether the planet is landable or not.

gravity.description: Planets only.  Gravity of the planet, as a ratio of the gravity of Earth.

earthMasses.description: Planets only.  Mass of the planet, as a ratio of the mass of Earth.

radius.description: Planets only.  Radius of the planet, measured in Kilimetres.

surfacePressure.description: Planets only.  Surface pressure of the planet, measured in atmospheres.

volcanismType.description: Planets only.  Volcanism type of the planet.

atmosphereType.description: Planets only.  Atmosphere type of the planet.

atmosphereComposition.description: Planets only.  Atmosphere composition of the planet, mapping each element to it's percentage.

solidComposition.description: Planets only.  Solid composition of the planet, mapping each element to it's percentage.

materials.description: Planets only.  Materials which can be found on the planet, mapping each material to it's percentage.

signals.description: Planets only.  The signals that can be found on the planet.

updateTime.description: The timestamp that the signals were last updated, in UTC.

genuses.description: Genuses which can be found on this planet.

reserveLevel.description: Planets only.  Reserve level of the planet.

updateTime.description: Timestamp of the last update of the station, in UTC.

realName.description: Real name of the station, for colonisation stations.

carrierName.description: Player given name of the station, for fleet carriers.

controllingFactionState.description: State of the controlling faction of the station.

distanceToArrival.description: Distance to the system arrival point of the station, measured in Kilometres.

economies.description: All econommies for the station, mapping each economy as a proportion of the stations economies.

latitude.description: Planetary stations only.  Latitude of the station.

longitude.description: Planetary stations only.  Longitude of the station.

landingPads.description: Breakdown of the number of landing pads of the station.

large.description: Numer of large landing pads of the station.

medium.description: Numer of medium landing pads of the station.

small.description: Numer of small landing pads of the station.

carrierDockingAccess.description: Carrier only.  Access control of the station.

market.description: Commodity market information about the station.

commodities.description: Commodities that can be bought and sold at about the station.

symbol.description: Frontier symbol identifier of the commodity.

commodityId.description: Frontier numeric identifier of the commodity.

buyPrice.description: Price the player can buy the commodity for.

sellPrice.description: Price the player can sell the commodity for.

prohibitedCommodities.description: Commodities that are illegal on the station.

updateTime.description: Timestamp of the last update of the marketplace for the station, in UTC.

ships.description: Ships that can be bought at the station.

symbol.description: Frontier symbol identifier of the ship.

shipId.description: Frontier numeric identifier of the ship.

updateTime.description: Timestamp of the last update of the shipyard for the station, in UTC.

modules.description: Outfitting modules that can be bought at the station.

symbol.description: Frontier symbol identifier of the module.

moduleId.description: Frontier numeric identifier of the module.

updateTime.description: Timestamp of the last update of the outfitting for the station, in UTC.

id64.description: ID64 of the system, a 64 bit unsigned integer.

bodyCount.description: Total number of planets and stars in the system.

date.description: Timestamp of the last update of the system, in UTC.

stations.description: All space based stations of the system.

factions.description: All factions with influence in the system.

powerState.description: State of the controlling power of the system.

progress.description: Progress of the power in the conflict.

powers.description: Powers with influence in the system.

controllingPower.description: Name of the controlling power of the system.

powerStateControlProgress.description: Progress of the controlling power in controlling the system.

powerStateReinforcement.description: Progress of the controlling power in reinforcing the system.

powerStateUndermining.description: Progress of the controlling power in losing the system.

thargoidWar.description: State of the Thargoid war in this system.

currentState.description: Current Thargoid state in this system.

successState.description: Thargoid state in this system if the war is won by the players.

failureState.description: Thargoid state in this system if the war is lost by the players.

progress.description: Progress of the Thargoid war in this system.

daysRemaining.description: Days remaining of the Thargoid war in this system.

portsRemaining.description: Posts remaining in the Thargoid war in this system.

successReached.description: Have the players won the Thargoid war in this system.

id64.description: ID64 of the system, a 64 bit unsigned integer.

mainStar.description: Class of the main star of the system.

needsPermit.description: Does the system need a permit to enter?

updateTime.description: Timestamp of the last update of the system, in UTC.

id64.description: ID64 of the system, a 64 bit unsigned integer.

nearest_populated_distance.description: Distance in LY to the nearest populated system.

nearest_populated_id64.description: ID64 of the nearest populated system, a 64 bit unsigned integer

updated_at.description: The timestamp that the system was last updated, in UTC.

controlling_faction_state.description: State of the controlling faction of the system.

is_being_colonised.description: Is the system currently being colonised?

controlling_power.description: Name of the controlling power of the system.

powerplay_conflict_progress.description: Progress of any conflict between powers in the system.

name.description: Name of the power involved in the conflict.

progress.description: Progress of the power in the conflict.

power_state_control_progress.description: Progress of the controlling power in controlling the system.

power_state_reinforcement.description: Progress of the controlling power in reinforcing the system.

power_state_undermining.description: Progress of the controlling power in losing the system.

needs_permit.description: Does the system need a permit to enter?

known_permit.description: Do we know where to get the permit for this system?

minor_faction_presences.description: All minor factions with influence in the system.

active_states.description: Currently active states for this faction.

powers.description: Powers with influence in the system.

power_state.description: State of the controlling power for this system.

body_count.description: Count of the number of bodies (planets and stars) that exist in the system.

bodies.description: All bodies which have been scanned in the system.

id.description: The ID of the body, a 64 bit unsigned integer.

id64.description: The ID64 of the body, a 64 bit unsigned integer.

bodyId.description: The numeric ID of the body within the system, a 64 bit unsigned integer.

is_main_star.description: Stars only.  Whether this is the main star of the system or not.

distance_to_arrival.description: Distance to the system arrival point of the body, measured in Kilometres.

estimated_scan_value.description: Estimated reward from scanning the body.

estimated_mapping_value.description: Estimated reward from mapping the body.

count.description: Count of the number of instances of this landmark on the body.

value.description: Estimated reward from scanning the landmark.

landmark_value.description: Total value of all the landmarks on the body.

stations.description: All stations which are known in the system.

market_id.description: The ID of the station , a 64 bit unsigned integer.
